creator: helenswng@yahoo.com
text:
I compiled Apache 2.0.45(Win32) with OpenSSL 0.9.6l and installed the NT 
service by using "-D SSL" option. NT service starts without problem but stops 
with Windows' Application Error popup: 
"Application popup: Apache.exe - Application Error : The instruction 
at "0x77f92373" referenced memory at "0x00000010". The memory could not 
be "written".

Click on OK to terminate the program
Click on CANCEL to debug the program "

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Most likely to be bug 20462.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 20462 ***
